Author: phideas#8309
Content:
@ballistic in early days it was not possible to claim rewards on ledger. only way to get accrued rewards, if user ‚Äúwillingly‚Äú extracted his privkeys, then reset his ledger to a new seed.
today there is a safe and user friendly solution https://atomiclabs.github.io/ledger-kmd-reward-claim/ or using magnum web wallet.

Author: ùôäùôûùô£ùô†#3612
Content:
FYI, Verus Agama 0.5.8-1 is available for download:
https://github.com/VerusCoin/Agama/releases/tag/v0.5.8-1
Notable changes:
- Added DigitalPrice coin
- Fixed bug that caused "invalid pub address" error when attempting to send Zcash.
- Updated Komodo logo
- Added Testnet support for Public Blockchains as a Service (PBaaS) and Verus Reserve cross-chain currency conversion technology

Author: ![HATCH] Hatch#3230
Content: Hello, Do you have the option to add a HATCH coin? We need this for further integration into the wallets supporting your platform.

Author: peepypoopy#4480
Content: Hello, I cannot access my funds. I have the seed phrase which I enter but the value is 0. The address is also different from before when I enter the seed phrase which is strange

Author: peepypoopy#4480
Content: I had my kmd on agama wallet mac

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: @![HATCH] Hatch you have to apply for listing and probably pay the listing fee, since you have a DASH fork, technically it's possible. Fill out the contact form on atomicdex.io under "Assets"

Author: peepypoopy#4480
Content: Any admin/support?

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: @peepypoopy  make sure you enter the seed without extra characters / spaces at the end of the seed, you only get different address if it's not the exact same seed. you can check balance for your address on https://kmdexplorer.io if you see your funds there, you are entering the wrong seed.

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: It happens a lot that people mistype a word, or press space twice somewhere, which will result in a different address in lite mode. Besides your seed,  it's recommended to have a backup of that address's private key which you can export in Agama from the settings.

Author: ![HATCH] Hatch#3230
Content: @Oszy Thank you. Yes, HATCH fork DASH, like any other coin using the X11 algorithm, but we have a lot of changes, including the use of our signature. Unlike other X11 projects that use the DASH signature, and their cost is 100 times higher than HATCH. We are looking for integration opportunities without listing fees. We corresponded with the guys from AtomicDEX but to no avail. It all ended at the cost of integration. Therefore, we decided to contact you directly.

Author: peepypoopy#4480
Content: @Oszy I enter my agama address into the explorer and the tokens are there. I enter my seed, I diligently write down all my seeds for wallets, and the address showing is differentü§î I would never have created a wallet without writing down the seed so I do not understand what is going on

Author: peepypoopy#4480
Content: This all happened after komodo warned us they had hacked their own wallet and we were told to download a new version or something
